name: Update an email template
statusMessage: Response status code is 400, Response body contains error message for Html content and html url sent together, Response body contains code: invalid_parameter

testStage.statusMessage: Response status code is 400, Response body contains error message for Html content and html url sent together, Response body contains code: invalid_parameter

steps.name: Response body contains error message for Html content and html url sent together

parameters.name: Request body
parameters.value:
{
  "tag": "OrderConfirmation",
  "sender": {
    "name": "Mary from MyShop",
    "email": "contact@myshop.com",
    "id": 3
  },
  "templateName": "Order Confirmation - EN",
  "htmlContent": "The order n°xxxxx has been confirmed. Thanks for your purchase",
  "htmlUrl": "https://html.domain.com",
  "subject": "Thanks for your purchase !",
  "replyTo": "support@myshop.com",
  "toField": "{FNAME} {LNAME}",
  "attachmentUrl": "https://attachment.domain.com",
  "isActive": true
}
